aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Kyle Roberts
aboutData.subtitle: Web Developer
aboutData.text: Creating interactive experiences is something I've always been passionate about. Looking to work on exciting creative projects that can utilize both my programming and communication experience! I'm an interactive designer, developer and multi-tasker with 10+ years experience developing professional content using video, animation, programming and design. 10+ years experience working with clients through trainings, presentations, and technical support.

Sharon Turner
informations.shortText: ...an integral part of our team...I sincerely hope to work with him again!
informations.text: Kyle just completed a year-long intranet migration project for our CDC customer with an eye for innovation and accessibility. This was content that in many cases hadn't been reviewed in over a decade. Kyle never complained. He would ask questions and then come back with a solution that would delight the team and content owner. 2020 will be remembered as a tough time for everyone but we were honored to have Kyle be an integral (and positive) part of our team while the project was underway. I sincerely hope to work with him again!

informations.title: Sarah Neale AuGustin
informations.shortText: ...was able to jump right in and was a huge asset to our team...
informations.text: Kyle is an excellent developer. He is professional, knowledgeable, and creative. We worked together on a project and Kyle was able to jump right in and was a huge asset to our team. He was not afraid to suggest creative solutions which the client loved! I would work with Kyle again in a heartbeat.

informations.title: Chip Morrison
informations.shortText: ...a great web developer and team player...an all-round professional...
informations.text: Kyle is a great web developer and team player. He is never too busy to help a colleague with a question. Kyle is an all-round professional with a great can-do attitude. I would have no hesitation in recommending Kyle for a position on any web team.

informations.title: Barbara Maniero
informations.shortText: ...always open to grow...by keeping up with new technologies...
informations.text: Kyle is a hard worker and dedicated developer. We took classes at college where he greatly helped understand and learn Flash/Actionscript, and then our path crossed again at Eyewonder. At EyeWonder we worked both as peers and then I as Team Lead. During his time at Eyewonder, Kyle spent his time both developing complex ads as well as providing support and guidance to our client using our API. Kyle is a great team player and always ready to help teammates and co-workers in general. He is knowledgeable and skilled yet always open to grow personally and professionally by keeping up with new technologies and trends. Kyle is a committed employee and a great asset for any company.

informations.title: Xiao Meng Zhu
informations.shortText: His solid design background...with increased development...a key asset...
informations.text: Kyle has been a great member of the creative team and has been instrumental in refining our customer facing training materials and received many accolades from peers and clients alike. His solid design background coupled with increased development focus has made him an all-rounder and key asset for high end campaigns. I look forward to working with him again in the future.

informations.title: Brian Rodriguez
informations.shortText: ...was one of the best trainers and mentors I've had the pleasure of working with...
informations.text: I worked with Kyle for over 7 years at EyeWonder; a company that, through acquisitions and mergers, eventually became what it is today - Sizmek. As a peer creative developer Kyle truly embodied the dual nature of that role showing an amazing skill at design and animation on the creative side, and in his ability to incorporate complex code in his projects which ranged from simple ad builds to more complex ad campaigns requiring use of Video, data loading, sound manipulation and a wide range of other skills. He's proficient on both sides of the Flash/HTML5 argument, and is excellent not only at doing, but also demonstrating this as he was one of the best trainers and mentors I've had the pleasure of working with and watching. Kyle always makes great efforts to be on the front edge of emerging technologies and concepts, ready to learn, use and share them with those around him. Beyond the daily grind, Kyle was a true pleasure to work with, being both personable, friendly, helpful, and with a healthy dose of humor and wit, could keep the tone of the office more bearable even in the most stressful of times. To any who are interested - he would be an absolute asset from the moment he's hired.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.subTitle: SeKON Enterprise, Inc.
experience.text: Created / managed content and developed Javascript chatbots on CDC.gov/covid site. Created / managed content for CDC’s Advanced Molecular Detection team on CDC.gov/amd site.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.subTitle: DLH Corporation
experience.text: Rebuilt CDC intranet site content for 100+ pages within National Center for HIV/AIDS, Viral Hepatitis, STD, and TB Prevention (NCHHSTP). Collaborated with UI / UX team, ensuring content was properly organized and accessible. Developed style guide to provide guidance for design of future content.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.subTitle: Northrop Grumman Corporation
experience.text: Developed and managed web content for 20+ sites within CDC.gov, using WordPress CMS, HTML, CSS and Javascript. Collaborated with UI / UX team to ensure content was properly organized and accessible. Created metrics reports on 400+ pages and presented websites’ annual performance, guiding division’s team to improve web traffic. Disseminated urgent news about outbreaks and important clinician webinars through design, distribution and archival of 500+ newsletters. Edited and prepared 30+ clinician webinars for CDC websites, ensuring accessibility for vision-impaired and hearing-impaired users. Designed branding elements for groups within the CDC.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.subTitle: Teksystems
experience.text: Developed and managed web content for 20+ sites within CDC.gov. Designed branding elements and posters for groups within CDC. dited and prepared 30+ clinician webinars for CDC websites, ensuring accessibility for vision-impaired and hearing-impaired users. Designed branding elements for CDC's Joint Information Center (JIC).

experience.title: Senior Developer
experience.subTitle: BBDO Atlanta
experience.text: Developed website for AT&T's 2015 'Strongest of the Strong' campaign using Angular.JS and PhantomJS. Collaborated on rebranding of company website. Developed 100+ HTML5 banners for AT&T, Metro Atlanta Chamber of Commerce and Novant Health using CSS and JavaScript.

experience.title: Creative Solutions Engineer
experience.subTitle: Sizmek (formerly EyeWonder/MediaMind)
experience.text: Developed website for AT&T's 2015 'Strongest of the Strong' campaign using Angular.JS and PhantomJS. Collaborated on rebranding of company website. Developed 100+ HTML5 banners for AT&T, Metro Atlanta Chamber of Commerce and Novant Health using CSS and JavaScript.

education.title: BFA, Interactive Media Design
education.subTitle: The Art Institute of Atlanta
education.text: Studied graphic design, programming, video/sound editing and 3D modeling.

education.title: Coursework - Music Industry
education.subTitle: Middle Tennessee State University
education.text: Studied drums and percussion and performed in numerous ensembles, such as jazz ensembles, salsa ensembles, and electronic music ensembles
